scripts.start-mob-dev: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev APP_WEB=192.168.0.10 APP_PORT=3000 APP_PROTOCOL=http meteor run android-device --settings settings/settings-local.json
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev APP_WEB=dev.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=443 APP_PROTOCOL=https meteor run --settings settings/settings-development.json
scripts.start-qa: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=qa APP_WEB=qa-ayamobi.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=3141 APP_PROTOCOL=http meteor run --settings settings/settings-qa.json
scripts.start-stg: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=stg APP_WEB=stg-ayamobi.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=3241 APP_PROTOCOL=http meteor run --settings settings/settings-staging.json
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod APP_WEB=web.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=443 APP_PROTOCOL=https meteor run --settings settings/settings-production.json
scripts.build-qa: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=qa APP_WEB=qa-ayamobi.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=3141 APP_PROTOCOL=http meteor build  /var/mobile/build/qa-ayamobi --server https://web.aya-jo.com:443 --mobile-settings settings/settings-qa.json
scripts.build-stg: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=stg APP_WEB=stg-ayamobi.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=3241 APP_PROTOCOL=http meteor build /var/mobile/build/stg-ayamobi --server https://web.aya-jo.com:443 --mobile-settings settings/settings-staging.json
scripts.build-prod: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod APP_WEB=web.aya-jo.com APP_PORT=443 APP_PROTOCOL=https meteor build  /var/mobile/build/ayamobi/ --server https://web.aya-jo.com:443 --mobile-settings settings/settings-production.json
